page.title: 13A Rural Priest.
page.content: The Rector, Pastor to 4500 people, with the help of a full time priest, serves five parishes, spread over an area five by eight miles, with over forty miles of road. It has six churches, three schools, a Convent, and a Youth Custodial Institution. A priest for 12 years, 5 as Rector, he tries to take off three days each month. Sunday is his easiest day! Arises at 0700, after coffee takes Communion at Hambleden, a sung Communion 0900 at another Church, refreshment at home before Family Communion at Hambleden. A quick drink with his parishioners at the Local and home for lunch at 1300 with his family of three children. Paperwork until 1700 tea, then Evensong in one of the Churches. Home for supper 1900, watches television until bedtime.
